title: Kylie Jenner slips into racy bunny outfit for Playboy bash
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner has been at it with the revealing Instagram posts this week and she's back with another to add to her collection.

As she celebrated Halloween, the make-up mogul slipped into a sexy silk bunny outfit, leaving nothing for the imagination.

The 22-year-old, who has daughter Stormi, pleased her large Instagram following with the racy snaps as she posed beside Stassie, real name Anastasia Karanikolaou - famous for being Kylie's bestfriend.

"stas said I'm having a playboy party.. pull up," Kylie wrote to her 149million fans.

In a series of snaps, the girls put on a racy display. Stassie was wearing the exact same bunny outfit, although the girls donned different coloured bunny ears.

They each wore a skimpy black bodysuit in a silk material - which cinched the pair in at the waist, adding sheer black tights, white shirt cuffs and collars for extra detail, and a fluffy tail for finishing touches.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star showcases her famous curves in the tiny suit.

Kylie and Stassie even donned the same long wavy hair, the only difference being Stassie is blonde.

Pictures show the girls in sexy poses, and in a few solo shots, Kylie is shown holding a red rose followed by a full length snap of herself in the scantily-clad bodysuit.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She recently dressed her one-year-old daughter as her mini-me after recreating her purple Met Gala look from earlier this year.

On Instagram, Kylie shared an adorable photo of Stormi dressed in a mini version of Kylie's custom Versace lilac ensemble for Halloween.

The toddler completed the mermaid-style look by sporting an identical purple wig, instantly transforming her into a mini version of her mum.

(Image: Instagram)

Kylie captioned the set of photos with: "My baby!! I cant handle this!!" along with multiple purple heart emojis.

The post was immediately flooded with adoring comments, with Sofia Ritchie writing: "Omg I can’t deal" with a heart eyes emoji.
description: Kylie Jenner is back with another sexy Instagram picture and she's left little to the imagination
